tool_description: Matches observed bird behaviors against known species-specific behavioral patterns to aid identification.

feeding_behavior.description: Feeding method: ground_foraging, aerial_hunting, probe_drilling, surface_gleaning

flight_pattern.description: Flight characteristics: soaring, flapping, hovering, diving

social_behavior.description: Social grouping: solitary, pairs, small_flock, large_flock

activity_level.description: Activity intensity: very_active, moderately_active, calm, inactive

error_messages: Empty behavior list: Provide at least one observed behavior.
Invalid feeding behavior: Use one of [ground_foraging, aerial_hunting, probe_drilling, surface_gleaning].
Invalid flight pattern: Use one of [soaring, flapping, hovering, diving].
Invalid social behavior: Use one of [solitary, pairs, small_flock, large_flock].
Invalid activity level: Use one of [very_active, moderately_active, calm, inactive].
usage: List observed_behaviors and optionally specify feeding_behavior, flight_pattern, social_behavior, and activity_level. Returns behavioral analysis for species matching.

behavior_matches.description: Species known for similar behavioral patterns
